title: Linux服务端在生成地狱时被杀进程
author: 将计就计4521
txt_content:
RT，连续三次被杀进程
设置的内存恒定为1024
错误报告 

[03:17:51] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing start region for dimension minecraft:overworld
[03:17:54] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 0%
[03:17:54] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 0%
[03:17:54] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 0%
[03:17:54] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 0%
[03:17:54] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 0%
[03:17:54] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 0%
[03:17:54] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 0%
[03:17:54] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 0%
[03:17:55] [Worker-Main-3/INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 0%
[03:17:55] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 63%
[03:17:56] [Server thread/INFO]: Time elapsed: 5264 ms
[03:17:56] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing start region for dimension minecraft:the_nether
[03:17:59] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 0%
./start.sh: line 1: 18486 Killed                  java -Xms1024M -Xmx1024M -jar spigot-1.16.1.jar nogui
求解答

replies.author: OOTW_Z
replies.txt_content: 可以设置java优先级，其次1.16.1并不是1g运存就能带动的

replies.author: 洞穴夜莺
replies.txt_content: 你的总物理内存有多少啊

replies.author: 将计就计4521
replies.txt_content:
OOTW_Z 发表于 2020-8-17 15:56
可以设置java优先级，其次1.16.1并不是1g运存就能带动的
请问优先级怎么设置的？1g运存我也没办法啊服务器开满就1G

replies.author: OOTW_Z
replies.txt_content: nice指令可以设置优先级，CSDN帖子不好搬运，你搜：linux设置程序优先级，至于运存设置，可以将你启动命令里-Xmx这个后门跟的就是设置的jvm最大运存，要根据机器配置设置，最好给系统留点。

replies.author: 将计就计4521
replies.txt_content:
OOTW_Z 发表于 2020-8-17 16:35
nice指令可以设置优先级，CSDN帖子不好搬运，你搜：linux设置程序优先级，至于运存设置，可以将你启动命令 ...
应经设置好了。原因就是拉的内存太高，没给系统导致被杀，设置成512虽然不会被杀但是经常带不起来
